scripts.healthcheck:reqres: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const https=require('https'); const key=process.env.X_API_KEY; if(!key) throw new Error('X_API_KEY missing'); const req=https.request('https://reqres.in/api/users/2',{headers:{'x-api-key':key,'accept':'application/json'}},res=>{console.log('HTTP',res.statusCode); process.exit(res.statusCode===200?0:1)}); req.on('error',e=>{console.error(e); process.exit(1)}); req.end();"
